entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening. Wind southwest 90 km/h becoming west 30 gusting to 50 early this evening then becoming north 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning near noon. Risk of freezing rain late in the afternoon. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to snow in the evening. Risk of freezing rain early in the evening. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
